data.message: Facebook how can I get a page that I manage enabled for the Global Pages feature? There is no global features tab when I go into the settings and I don't think it is enabled for that page.

replies.message:
Hi Conrad. You can learn more about creating Global Pages here:  http://bit.ly/2tJCCyA.
 This feature is gradually rolling out and may not be available to you right now. -William

I am aware of this page however, is there anyway that I can activate global pages for my business if it isn't "rolled out" to us yet? Is there someone I can talk to that can manually activate this feature for me?
